General.Name: Lottery.com, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Lottery.com Inc., a digital publisher, provides lottery data results, jackpots, results, and other data. The company delivers daily results of approximately 800 domestic and international lottery games from 40 countries, including the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom to 400 digital publishers and media organizations. Its B2B API platform provides users with the ability to purchase legally sanctioned draw lottery games through a mobile or computer device, as well as engages in sweepstakes campaigns. The company also launch Sports.com. Lottery.com Inc. is headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas.
General.Address: 5049 Edwards Ranch Road, Fort Worth, TX, United States, 76109
